title: Social Problem-Solving Simulation through Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and basic ability to analyze social issues
context.additional_context: A course strengthening critical thinking and communication skills needed to solve real-world social issues through collaborative activities in VR environments.

learning_goals: Learners can present multidimensional solutions to complex social issues through Collaborative Answer Negotiation Activities (CANA)
Learners can perform real-time opinion coordination and consensus-building with peers using digital devices with over 80% accuracy
Learners can measure teamwork competencies in simulation/VR environments and record self-assessments averaging over 4 points (on a 5-point scale)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
